property.name: title
property.label: Component title
property.description: This is the text that will be displayed as the component title. If blank, the title will not display.

property.name: recordsToShow
property.label: Maximum number of records to show

property.name: showNoTopicsMessage
property.label: Display this component even if no topics are followed
property.description: Check this box in order to display a prompt to the user if they follow no topics. Otherwise, the component does not display on page when no topics are followed.

property.name: noTopicsTitle
property.label: No topics - Component Title
property.description: The component displays this title no topics are followed by the user.

property.name: noTopicsMessage
property.label: No topics - Message
property.description: The component displays this message no topics are followed by the user.

property.name: noTopicsButtonLabel
property.label: No topics - Button label
property.description: Use to control the label for the no topics button. Leave blank to not display a button.

property.name: noTopicsButtonLink
property.label: No topics - Button link
property.description: Use to control the link for the no topics button. This typically links to a list of topics. Leave blank to not display a button.

property.name: customClass
property.label: CSS Class
property.description: Apply additional SLDS or custom CSS class
